alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 4:31PM EDT until April 01 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SCHUYLER...CHEMUNG...SOUTHWESTERN TIOGA... SOUTHEASTERN STEUBEN...SOUTHWESTERN TOMPKINS AND BRADFORD COUNTIES... At 431 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Millport to Le Roy, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chemung, Elmira, Corning, Southport, Barton, Big Flats, Horseheads, Sayre, Waverly and Elmira Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
